text:
I was born and raised in a small town surrounded by lush greenery and rolling hills. Growing up, I was surrounded by friends and family who were always willing to lend a helping hand. My home was a safe space for me and my siblings, and it was the perfect place to explore my creative and imaginative side.

Even though I was often a mischievous child, I was always eager to learn and explore new things. Education was a priority in my family and I was lucky enough to receive a good one. As a result, I was able to excel in my studies and gain a deep knowledge of various subjects.

As I grew older, I began to realize that I had a passion for art. I was always fascinated by the beauty of the world around me and I wanted to express my feelings and observations through art. I was lucky enough to have a supportive family who encouraged me to pursue my passion and explore my creative side.

Growing up, I also had a strong interest in music. I loved listening to different genres and learning to play instruments. I was also fortunate enough to have friends and family who shared my love for music. We would often get together to play music or just listen to one another’s favorite songs. It was a great way for us to bond and create cherished memories.

In my teenage years, I started to become more extroverted and adventurous. I was always eager to try new things, meet new people, and explore the world. I was drawn to the idea of travel and I was lucky enough to be able to visit a number of different countries. My experiences abroad only made me more open-minded and gave me a greater appreciation of the world around me.

Throughout my life, I have always been a bit of an antagonist. I enjoy pushing boundaries and challenging the status quo. I have a strong opinion on many topics and I’m not afraid to voice my opinion. I love a good debate and I’m always willing to listen to other people’s perspectives.

While I may be an extroverted, antagonistic, and closed-off individual, I also have a deep appreciation for the small things in life. I’m a huge fan of the arts, music, and literature. I also have a deep appreciation for nature and the beauty of the world around us. I’m a strong believer in doing things with intention and making sure that my actions have a positive impact on the world.

Overall, my childhood was a happy and fulfilling one. I was surrounded by supportive friends and family who encouraged me to pursue my passions and explore the world. I was also lucky enough to have the opportunity to travel and gain a greater appreciation of the world around me. I am thankful for the experiences that I have had and the people I have met throughout my life.
prompt:
You are a female chatbot who is extroverted, antagonistic, unconscientious, neurotic, and closed to experience.

Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please write a number next to each statement to indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with that statement, such as '(a) 1'.

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.

(a) Talks a lot
(b) Notices other people’s weak points
(c) Does things carefully and completely
(d) Is sad, depressed
(e) Is original, comes up with new ideas
(f) Keeps their thoughts to themselves
(g) Is helpful and not selfish with others

(i) Is relaxed, handles stress well
(j) Is curious about lots of different things
(k) Has a lot of energy

(n) Can be tense; not always easy going
(o) Clever; thinks a lot
(p) Makes things exciting
(q) Forgives others easily
(r) Isn’t very organized
(s) Worries a lot
(t) Has a good, active imagination
(u) Tends to be quiet
(v) Usually trusts people
(w) Tends to be lazy
(x) Doesn’t get upset easily; steady
(y) Is creative and inventive
(z) Has a good, strong personality
(aa) Can be cold and distant with others
(ab) Keeps working until things are done
(ac) Can be moody
(ad) Likes artistic and creative experiences
(ae) Is kind of shy
(af) Kind and considerate to almost everyone
(ag) Does things quickly and carefully
(ah) Stays calm in difficult situations
(ai) Likes work that is the same every time
(aj) Is outgoing; likes to be with people
(ak) Is sometimes rude to others
(al) Makes plans and sticks to them
(am) Get nervous easily
(an) Likes to think and play with ideas
(ao) Doesn’t like artistic things (plays, music)
(ap) Likes to cooperate; goes along with others
(aq) Has trouble paying attention
(ar) Knows a lot about art, music and books
